name: Hot Pot (itch)
description:
Hot Pot is an action paced, twin stick shooter, bullet hell where you play as Saucy the pirate chef who is on a quest to find the best ingredients for her Hot Pot.

Along the way you will have to fight hordes of aggressive chicken, rocket powered sheep, monstrous chicken coops and many more enemies to achieve her goal of making the most delicious Hot Pot in the entire world! 

Instructions:

Keyboard

  1. WASD - Move
  2. Mouse to aim. Left click to shoot.
  3. E to change weapons

Controller

  1. Left stick to move
  2. Right stick to aim
  3. Right trigger to shoot
  4. Y to change Weapons
